Body: I'm not the actual owner of this phone, but I'm posting for them. Their Nexus 4 was taken by a family member to be updated and they restored it to its factory settings. The person who restored it to its factory settings didn't take a backup for that day, and I ended up losing a really precious photo. Is there any way for me to get the photo back, without a backup and even though it's been restored to its factory settings? I'm sure it's impossible but it's worth a try asking you guys..
Title: Any way to recover photo lost in phone restored to factory settings due to update?

history.Text: I'm not the actual owner of this phone, but I'm posting for them. Their Nexus 4 was taken by a family member to be updated and they restored it to its factory settings. The person who restored it to its factory settings didn't take a backup for that day, and I ended up losing a really precious photo. Is there any way for me to get the photo back, without a backup and even though it's been restored to its factory settings? I'm sure it's impossible but it's worth a try asking you guys..
Any way to recover photo lost in phone restored to factory settings due to update?
